author: Source: Surreycomet.co.uk
title: Graeme Le Saux fears Chelsea saga will drive women away from football - Surreycomet.co.uk
text:
Graeme Le Saux fears women will have been discouraged to forge a career in football after Jose Mourinho's criticism of Eva Carneiro and the subsequent fallout. Former Chelsea player Le Saux, who sits on the Football Association inclusion advisory board, suggested the game has "gone back 30 years" because of the saga.
 Surreycomet.co.uk.
